MajorClaims.MC1: one who studies overseas will gain many skills throughout this experience
MajorClaims.MC2: living and studying overseas gives the individual a new perspective on the subject that is studied or in general life

Claims.C1: studying at an overseas university gives individuals the opportunity to improve social skills by interacting and communicating with students from different origins and cultures
Claims.C2: living and studying overseas is an irreplaceable experience when it comes to learn standing on your own feet
Claims.C3: one who has studied and lived overseas will become more eligible for the job than his/her peers
Claims.C4: there are many difficulties a student might face when studying and living overseas

Premises.P1: Compared to the peers studying in the home country, it will be more likely for the one who is living overseas to be successful in adapting himself/herself into new environments and situations in life
Premises.P2: One who is living overseas will of course struggle with loneliness, living away from family and friends
Premises.P3: those difficulties will turn into valuable experiences in the following steps of life
Premises.P4: the one will learn living without depending on anyone else
Premises.P5: employers are mostly looking for people who have international and language skills
Premises.P6: Becoming successful in this study will give the student an edge in job market
